item.title: Introduction to AI environmental impacts at SciencesPo
item.description: Introduction course on the environmental impacts of AI to master students at SciencesPo Paris.

item.title: Green AI Ecosystem at Hub France IA
item.description: An overview of the Green AI french ecosystem for the Hub France IA sustainability working group.

item.title: Estimate and reduce AI's environmental impacts in the cloud
item.description: In the webinar hosted by FinOps x GreenOps Meetup, I present how to evaluate and reduce the environmental impacts of AI models in the cloud.

item.title: Boavizta Workshops: Infra, Cloud and AI at Green Coding Summit
item.description: Benjamin Le Bigot and I participated the Green Coding Summit 2023 in Berlin to represent Boavizta.

item.title: The great challenges of generative AI (white paper)
item.description: This webinar presents the Data For Good white paper on the risks and challenges of generative AI technologies.

item.title: Continuous estimation of environmental impacts of ML solutions
item.description: In this webinar hosted by Datacraft, I present available methodologies, best practices and tools to estimate the environmental impacts of AI technologies on the whole life cycle.

item.title: Evaluate environmental impacts of AI with SoftAWERE
item.description: In a webinar for the German AI Association, Benoit Petit and I presented our work on SoftAWERE a project to evaluate the environmental impacts in GitLAB CI/CD pipelines.

item.title: Integrate ICT environmental impacts with BoaviztAPI
item.description: In this workshop hosted by Planet Tech’Care, we present BoaviztAPI, one of main the project at Boavizta.

item.title: Understanding and reducing the environmental footprint of AI at CentraleSupélec
item.description: Introduction course on the environmental impacts of AI to MSc students at CentraleSupélec.

item.title: Alygne consumers and investors values with their actions using applied NLP
item.description: A presentation on what we do at Alygne and how we are making frugal AI in the NLP field.

item.title: Multicriteria impact assessment of ICT at Boavizta
item.description: A short presentation on the methodologies and tools that we develop at Boavizta.

item.title: Projects
